original: apply mkmon. - intros R S H1 H2. apply union2_evolve_left with (S':=S) in H1. apply union2_evolve_right with (S:=S') in H2. apply union2_evolve with (R:=R) (S:=S) (S':=S') in H1. apply H1. - intros R S H1 H2. apply incl_evolve with (R':=F R) in H2. apply incl_evolve with (R:=F S) in H2. apply mon_a in H2. apply H2. - intros R S H1 H2. apply evolve_union in H2. apply union_evolve. intros i. apply mon_t. apply H1. apply H2.
